item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @fishys fishys
item.description:
@fishys wrote:

Youve got to have the code exact, if one part of it is messed up it will mess everything up.
Make sure you have it only in the spots you need it or else your whole server will have one big error or possibly a small one
Hope i helped

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @kniveslives kniveslives
item.description:
@kniveslives wrote:

[quote=“darkstar447, post:1, topic:152039”]ok i still need help with a pickup command and i also want to no how to change the colors of items just for fun
help is very apretiated plz post quickly and i will b happy hehe cuzz i dont get replied to fast or i dont even get relpied to so one of u super smart people plz help me[/quote]

else if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Knives”) || playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
if (/*newItemID <= 20000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10”);
}

Read full topic
